snippet: PANUSH--Hyman, 100, on February 5, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Miriam and Zelda, devoted father of Miriam, Donnie, Ben-Zion, Bashie and David. Adored grandfather of Elana, Adina, Moshe, Sippy, Yitzy, Zerlina, Lucy, Michelle and Jake. Great-grandfather of Dovi, Aliza and newborn baby girl. Service Sunday, February 7, 11:15am at "The Riverside," 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3
lead_paragraph: PANUSH--Hyman, 100, on February 5, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Miriam and Zelda, devoted father of Miriam, Donnie, Ben-Zion, Bashie and David.
